function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited availability of multimodal sensing systems for covid-19 symptoms hinders comprehensive disease monitoring and prevention.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing of temperature data with mobile app via bluetooth can lead to unauthorized access of sensitive health information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not be accurate, leading to incorrect temperature readings and potential misdiagnosis or improper treatment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Introduction of wearable pulse oximeter devices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of respiratory rate monitoring for disease evaluation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cough and lung sound monitoring for contagious disease symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring dry cough for covid-19 detection and prevention.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traditional ecg monitoring systems may increase staff-to-patient contact, leading to potential cross-infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cuff-based blood pressure monitoring by medical staff increases their work load and the possibility of them becoming infected.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous and remote monitoring of bp is essential for covid-19-positive patients to prevent sudden events and reduce cross-contamination.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Obstacles exist in achieving accurate bp estimations, especially when tracking responses to medications, due to the dynamic nature and variability of bp in different individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and deep learning for covid-19 diagnosis and prevention.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forecasting pandemic spread using ai and data analysis.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smartwatch data collection and heuristic model used for disease detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of ai in medical research and social context during pandemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for outcome prediction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on remote monitoring and data transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure of healthcare systems due to resource mismanagement","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate access to healthcare facilities leading to increased travel for diagnosis and testing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of efficient data and application accessibility for healthcare management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to proximity of edge and fog computing to iot devices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and sanitation protocols for edge and fog computing infrastructure","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on cloud and iot for data processing and communication in edge and fog computing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through wearable devices and environmental sensors in the home hospitalization system.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education about the use of iot-based devices and mobile applications in the context of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing cost-effective sensing units for low-income patients.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable sensors may not accurately detect airborne pathogens, leading to false sense of security.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate privacy measures for sharing covid-19 electronic medical records cemrs could result in breaches and misuse of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of outdoor environment occupancy and density may lead to ineffective crowd management and disease transmission control.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on post-covid-19-infection effects on patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on incomplete symptom screening for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical studies evaluating the effectiveness of digital contact tracing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact on mental health due to the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clinical staff using pulse oximeters can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between uses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using consumer-grade wearables to measure students’ anxiety and depression may lead to data privacy and security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential barriers to wearables’ usage in healthcare due to prototype stages and user acceptance, security, ethics, and big data concerns.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security breach risk in wearable devices","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data security and patient confidentiality concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Legal, regulatory, and policy challenges","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges related to the design trade-offs, improved sensors, power, size, computation algorithms, and security","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious respiratory illnesses pose a persistent threat to global well-being.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited control of environmental conditions and confounding factors in natural history studies.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of environmental factors such as temperature, humidity, and uv radiation on virus survivability and transmission rates.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of sars-cov-2 across countries through air travel","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in the transmission potential of sars-cov-2 within a country due to vehicle concentration and urbanization","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health expenditure as a proxy for differences in countries’ commitment to population health","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsubstantiated conclusions on the impact of heat and sunlight on sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on seasonal variations to contain sars-cov-2 spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis based on covid-19 cases per million inhabitants and country’s latitude could lead to oversimplified conclusions about disease propagation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data set of 117 countries may not be representative of global disease propagation patterns","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
